details.description: A book might contain poetry, historical accounts, information pertaining to a particular field of lore, diagrams and notes on gnomish contraptions, or just about anything else that can be represented using text or pictures. A book of spells is a @Compendium[dnd5e.items.LBajgahniRJbAgDr]{Spellbook}.
